item.title: Install Docker on Raspberry Pi
item.description: Environment Operating System : Raspbian GNU/Linux 9 (stretch) Model : Raspberry Pi 2 (Model B) Docker Installation Procedure on Raspberry Pi The following steps showed the step by step installation guideline. Raspian Information Check the model of the Raspberry Pi: cat /proc/device-tree/model It confirms that I have a Raspberry Pi 2 (Model B) Raspberry Pi 2 Model B Rev 1.1 Check the Operating System (OS) of the Raspberry Pi:
